languages.text: Whenever the wearer kills their target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, all enemies in a 2-cell range around the wearer suffer <u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder kills their target with a melee attack, all enemies in a 2-cell range around the wielder suffer <u>Willpower bonus</u> mental damage.

languages.text: Когда персонаж убивает цель {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атакой в ближнем бою{/g}, все противники в радиусе 2 клеток вокруг него получают <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g}</u> психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder kills their target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g}, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around the wielder suffer <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж убивает цель {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атакой в ближнем бою{/g}, все противники в радиусе 2 клеток вокруг него получают <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}でターゲットを倒すと、使用者から半径2セル{g|Encyclopedia:Range}以内{/g}の全ての敵は<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>精神{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を負う。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills their target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, all enemies in a 2-cell {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} around the wearer suffer <u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 自身が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}でターゲットを倒す度、自身から半径2セル以内の全ての敵に<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を付与。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}でターゲットを倒すと、使用者から半径2セル{g|Encyclopedia:Range}以内{/g}の全ての敵は<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>精神{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を負う。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador mata a un objetivo con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, todos los enemigos a una distancia de 2 casillas a su alrededor sufren <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} mental.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills their target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, all enemies in a 2-cell range around the wearer suffer <u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador mata a un objetivo con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, todos los enemigos en un radio de 2 casillas a su alrededor sufren <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger sein Ziel mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} tötet, erleiden alle Feinde in einem Umkreis von 2 Feldern um den Träger <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Trägers</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Mentalschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills their target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, all enemies in a 2-cell range around the wearer suffer <u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger sein Ziel mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} tötet, erleiden alle Feinde in einem 2-Zellen-Radius um den Träger <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur élimine sa cible dans le cadre d'une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui subissent <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} de l'utilisateur</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} mentaux.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills their target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, all enemies in a 2-cell range around the wearer suffer <u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişi, hedefini {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} ile öldürürse takan kişiye en fazla 2 hücre uzakta bulunan tüm düşmanlar {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} zihinsel {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalırlar.
